transcript.content: Good afternoon. LAMA GP surgery. How can I assist you in your emergency?
Hi, I need urgent help. I am experiencing loss of consciousness.
Can you confirm your name and date of birth for identity verification?
My name is Jonathan Barnett and I was born on June 15, 1956.
Thank you, Jonathan Barnett. I've located your records. Let me assist you immediately.
Please stay calm. I am arranging an ambulance for your loss of consciousness. Is there someone with you?
Good. Ensure they keep you comfortable. The ambulance will arrive shortly. Please stay on the line for any updates.
